isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING PUMP: VICKERS (LUK) V10NF AND V20NF - TEST PROCEDURES - TEST 1: PUMP MAXIMUM PRESSURE RELIEF

svcproc.title: TEST 1: PUMP MAXIMUM PRESSURE RELIEF
svcproc.para: With the engine at idle, close the shut off valve (load valve) on the analyzer. When completely shut off, read and record the output pressure at which the pump pressure relief valve opens. Compare that value with the pump specified value. Refer to SPECIFICATIONS.

warning.para: Watch the pressure gauge closely while closing the load valve. If the pressure rises rapidly or uncontrollably, do not close the load valve until the pressure relief valve has been inspected. Pump damage may occur or hoses may rupture and cause personal injury if the pressure relief valve fails to relieve pressure when the load valve is closed.

caution.para: Do not operate the pump more than 5 seconds with the valve closed because the fluid may overheat and damage the pump. Allow fluid to cool to normal test temperatures, 160 degrees to 200 degrees F (71 degrees to 93 degrees C), before resuming tests.
